email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body: Dear John, I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 50,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai next month. Could you provide your best freight rate and available vessel for this shipment? Best regards, Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body: Hi Laura, Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN QUEEN, which is available for your shipment. The freight rate is $25/MT on a CIF basis. The vessel has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290m. Laycan is 15-20 November. Please let me know if this works for you. Best regards, John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thank you for the prompt response. The rate seems a bit high. Can you do $22/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best regards, Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body: Dear Laura, I can offer $23/MT, which is the best I can do. The demurrage rate is $20,000/day pro rata. Please confirm if this is acceptable so we can proceed with the arrangements. Best regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body: Hi John, $23/MT is acceptable. Please send the recap and we will proceed with the booking. Best regards, Laura

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Recap - Coal Shipment - OCEAN QUEEN
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura, Please find the recap below:
- Commodity: Coal
- Cargo Size: 50,000MT
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Freight Rate: USD 23/MT CIF
- Laycan: 15-20 November
- Demurrage: $20,000/day

Please confirm if everything is correct. Best regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Recap - Coal Shipment - OCEAN QUEEN
email_chain.body: Hi John, Everything looks correct. Please proceed with the booking. Best regards, Laura
